name: The Impossible Planet
description:
Game for GMTK.

You are guilty to be Human on some random planet...

you can set free only if you beat the fights using the only cheap weapon they can give you...

this weapon is dual chain can chain other things togheter.... 

as Usual:
MOVE: ASDW

MOUSE: AIM+ATTACK

For limits of time  i wasn't able to implement more enemy, stat-up, other effects, boss fight,  and random things was planing at the start..

Time use on the development : 11 Hours.
